attributes.action: lower petrol prices in the uk
attributes.additional_details:
As we all know we get ripped of in the UK on fuel tax. We know have been stopped from doing rolling road blocks and from protesting against the fuel tax the only way forward is to help protest through this web site. We need the government to drop fuel tax by 30p a litre b4 the transport industry goes bankrupt and b4 the general public can not use there vehicles. This is what will happen in the UK if this doesn't happen
1) transport will stop
2) car industry will leave the UK
3) the general public will not be able to travel to work via there own transport
4) public transport will cost too much to use
